name: Glide City
description:
A small game I made as part of a larger game a month thing I've been working on for the past half a year or so. 

The game is just kinda chill you glide around as a paper plane amongst these huge buildings and clouds. Try not to crash into a building because then you lose momentum and the plane kinda just does weird shit when its got no momentum.

The only real controls to the game are the mouse you just look around to direct the plane. Pressing Escape will pause and then holding it down will quit the game.
